capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, you know, the former Charms master from Hogwarts. I've always believed that a good mantra can make all the difference in one's life. It's not just about repeating words, but about finding the right rhythm and intention behind them. As a professor, I've seen many students struggle to find their own unique mantras, but once they do, it's like a weight has been lifted off their shoulders.
